name: Transport, train, diesel powered
description: This cradle-to-gate unit process is for the transport of 1 tonne of freight 1 kilometer via diesel powered rail. This data is from The Greenhouse Gases, Regulated Emissions, and Energy Use in Transportation 2023 Model (GREET).

processDocumentation.timeDescription: This unit process is representative of freight train operation and fuel consumption in the year 2012.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This process is representative of freight train transport in the United States.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Combustion of diesel in a freight train. The energy intensity per ton-kilometer for freight railroad is calculated as: (Fuel Use * Heating Value)/Revenue Ton Kilometers.
processDocumentation.modelingConstantsDescription: This process was adapted from GREET, 2023.
processDocumentation.completenessDescription:
TREATMENT OF MISSING ENVIRONMENTAL DATA: Unknown. Refer to GREET, 2023

TREATMENT OF MISSING TECHNOSPHERE DATA: Unknown. Refer to GREET, 2023

MASS BALANCE: Unknown. Refer to GREET, 2023
processDocumentation.dataSelectionDescription: This dataset was sourced from GREET, 2023. No data was excluded.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
BOUNDARY CONDITIONS: Pump to wheel, includes combustion emissions

DATA COLLECTION: The data for total revenue ton-kilometers and fuel consumption by year are obtained from Railroad Facts 2013 published by Association of American Railroads (2014) and were published in the GREET model in 2014.

UNCERTAINTY ESTIMATION: Unknown. Refer to GREET, 2023
processDocumentation.dataCollectionDescription: Data from GREET was collected in 2012. GREET also references data from the following years: 1995, 2000, 2005, and 2010; it is unclear what data was collected in this years.
processDocumentation.intendedApplication: The intended application for this process is for accounting purposes as described in Goal Situation C1 from the ILCD Handbook's Detailed Guidance. LCA studies with this intended application offer "purely descriptive documentation of the system under analysis (e.g., a product, sector or country), without being interested in any potential consequences on other parts of the economy.” The studies categorized under Goal Situation C1 do consider existing benefits outside the analyzed system such as recycling. These data are an update to a previously published dataset.

dataGenerator.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG

dataDocumentor.name: Franklin Associates, A Division of ERG
